scripts.android-dev: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && react-native run-android  --variant=devDebug --appId 'com.hnh_mobile'
scripts.android-staging: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && react-native run-android  --variant=stagingDebug --appId 'com.hnh_mobile'
scripts.android-product: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && react-native run-android  --variant=productDebug --appId 'com.hnh_mobile'
scripts.android-apk-staging: export ENVFILE=.env.staging && cd android && ./gradlew assembleStagingRelease && cd ..
scripts.android-apk-dev: export ENVFILE=.env.development && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevRelease && cd ..
scripts.android-apk-product: export ENVFILE=.env.production && cd android && ./gradlew assembleProductRelease && cd ..
scripts.android-bundle-product: export ENVFILE=.env.production && cd android && ./gradlew bundleProductRelease && cd ..
scripts.android-bundle-staging: export ENVFILE=.env.staging && cd android && ./gradlew bundleStagingRelease && cd ..
